description: This file defines an abstract class 'Request' that serves as a base for specific request implementations in a mock Zigbee core testing framework. It contains a request ID and an abstract execute method.

classes.name: Request
classes.description: An abstract class representing a generic request with a request ID and an abstract execute method.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Abstract method to execute the request; to be implemented by subclasses.
